name: Eyewa Limited
description: Operator of an online optical store intended to simplify the eyewear shopping experience. The company's store offers several types of eyewear including sunglasses, prescription glasses, blue-light reading glasses, and contact lenses, enabling customers to have access to an easy and affordable fashion-focused experience.
one_liner: Operator of an online optical store intended to simplify the eyewear shopping experience. The company's store offers several types of eyewear including sunglasses, prescription glasses, blue-light reading glasses, and contact lenses, enabling customers to have access to an easy and affordable fashion-focused experience.
